code: import React from"react";var handleChange=function handleChange(event){var buttonNumber=event.target.id.toString().charAt(event.target.id.length-1);var bnt1="button-sub"+buttonNumber;var bnt2="button-number"+buttonNumber;var bnt3="button-add"+buttonNumber;var number=document.getElementById(bnt2).innerText;if(event.target.id===bnt1){if(number==="0")return;document.getElementById(bnt2).innerText=(Number.parseInt(number)-1).toString();}else{if(event.target.id===bnt3){document.getElementById(bnt2).innerText=(Number.parseInt(number)+1).toString();}}};function CountingButton(props){var id1="button-sub"+props.id;var id2="button-number"+props.id;var id3="button-add"+props.id;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"button",id:id1,onClick:handleChange},"-"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"button",id:id2,onClick:handleChange},"0"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"button",id:id3,onClick:handleChange},"+"));}export default CountingButton;
